items.sentence: Have you ever eaten this kind of cake before?
I can\'t believe I let you talk me into this.
I can\'t believe that you enjoyed that movie.
Tom has lots of time to do anything he wants.
Tom has more important things to worry about.
Tom has more than twenty years of experience.
My father always speaks in a very loud voice.
My older sister takes a shower every morning.
My parents came to the airport to see me off.
Tom accidentally hit his thumb with a hammer.
Tom is the person I told you about yesterday.
Tom is the person who told me how to do that.
Tom is thinking about what he should do next.
Tom is too smart to do something that stupid.
Tom is trying to do what you asked him to do.
Tom is trying to help Mary with her homework.
I wouldn\'t be surprised if Tom didn\'t come.
I assumed Tom and Mary were husband and wife.
The only person Tom ever talks about is Mary.
The portions at this restaurant are generous.
